languages.text: "Она вымогает взятки и подношения. Подарки. Одолжения. Особое отношение к себе. Пользуясь слухами о связи, имеющей, гм, место между ней и Вашей Светлостью, она бессовестно собирает мзду со всех окружающих, намекая на ваше недовольство, которое обрушится на тех, кто ей не услужит. Сам я, в силу своих полномочий, подвергаюсь ее нападкам особенно часто".

"She is extorting bribes and oblations. Gifts. Favours. For herself, in particular. She is exploiting rumours of a connection between, ahem, herself and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to unscrupulously gather bribes from all and sundry, hinting at how displeased Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will be to hear if anyone is being uncooperative. I myself have found myself the victim of her attacks with particular frequency, due to my position."
languages.original_text: "Она вымогает взятки и подношения. Подарки. Одолжения. Особое отношение к себе. Пользуясь слухами о связи, имеющей, гм, место между ней и Вашей Светлостью, она бессовестно собирает мзду со всех окружающих, намекая на ваше недовольство, которое обрушится на тех, кто ей не услужит. Сам я, в силу своих полномочий, подвергаюсь ее нападкам особенно часто".

I myself have found myself the victim of her attacks with particular frequency, due to my position."

I myself have found myself the victim of her attacks with particular frequency, due to my position."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: “她在到处勒索贿赂、贡品、礼物、恩惠，尤其是为了她自己的利益。她利用她自己与大人您之间有某种关系的传闻，肆无忌惮地朝所有人索取贿赂，还暗示说如果有人不愿合作，大人您会非常不高兴。我自己也注意到，由于我位高权重，我也时常沦为她的受害者。”
languages.original_text: "She is extorting bribes and oblations. Gifts. Favours. For herself, in particular. She is exploiting rumours of a connection between, ahem, herself and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to unscrupulously gather bribes from all and sundry, hinting at how displeased Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will be to hear if anyone is being uncooperative. I myself have found myself the victim of her attacks with particular frequency, due to my position."

traits.locale_text: “她在到处勒索贿赂、贡品、礼物、恩惠，尤其是为了她自己的利益。她利用她自己与大人您之间有某种关系的传闻，肆无忌惮地朝所有人索取贿赂，还暗示说如果有人不愿合作，大人您会非常不高兴。我自己也注意到，由于我位高权重，我也时常沦为她的受害者。”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: 「彼女は賄賂やお布施を強要しているのです。贈り物も好意も己のために。彼女と陛下の間に繋がりがあるという噂を利用して、不謹慎にもあらゆる人々から賄賂を集めているのです。陛下が、自分に非協力的な相手がいればどれだけ不愉快に思うか、ほのめかしながら。私も、立場上、彼女の攻撃の犠牲にしばしばなってきました」
languages.original_text: "She is extorting bribes and oblations. Gifts. Favours. For herself, in particular. She is exploiting rumours of a connection between, ahem, herself and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to unscrupulously gather bribes from all and sundry, hinting at how displeased Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will be to hear if anyone is being uncooperative. I myself have found myself the victim of her attacks with particular frequency, due to my position."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女は賄賂やお布施を強要しているのです。贈り物も好意も己のために。彼女と陛下の間に繋がりがあるという噂を利用して、不謹慎にもあらゆる人々から賄賂を集めているのです。陛下が、自分に非協力的な相手がいればどれだけ不愉快に思うか、ほのめかしながら。私も、立場上、彼女の攻撃の犠牲にしばしばなってきました」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: «Extorsiona para obtener sobornos y dádivas. Regalos. Favores. Para sí misma específicamente. Está explotando los rumores de una relación entre ella y usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}, para recibir sobornos de toda clase de personas, indicando que mi{mf|lord|lady} estará muy decepcionad{mf|o|a} con quienes no cooperen. Dada mi posición, he sido víctima de sus ataques con una frecuencia inusitada».
languages.original_text: "She is extorting bribes and oblations. Gifts. Favours. For herself, in particular. She is exploiting rumours of a connection between, ahem, herself and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to unscrupulously gather bribes from all and sundry, hinting at how displeased Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will be to hear if anyone is being uncooperative. I myself have found myself the victim of her attacks with particular frequency, due to my position."

traits.locale_text: «Extorsiona para obtener sobornos y dádivas. Regalos. Favores. Para sí misma específicamente. Está explotando los rumores de una relación entre ella y usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}, para recibir sobornos de toda clase de personas, indicando que mi{mf|lord|lady} estará muy decepcionad{mf|o|a} con quienes no cooperen. Dada mi posición, he sido víctima de sus ataques con una frecuencia inusitada».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: « Elle extorque des pots-de-vin et des offrandes. Des cadeaux. Des faveurs. Pour elle-même, en particulier. Elle exploite les rumeurs d'un lien entre, hum... sa personne et Votre Seigneurie, pour mieux soutirer des dessous-de-table au tout-venant, laissant entendre que vous seriez terriblement {mf|fâché|fâchée} d'apprendre que quelqu'un a refusé de coopérer. J'ai moi-même été victime de ses attaques à de multiples reprises, de par ma position. »
languages.original_text: "She is extorting bribes and oblations. Gifts. Favours. For herself, in particular. She is exploiting rumours of a connection between, ahem, herself and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to unscrupulously gather bribes from all and sundry, hinting at how displeased Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will be to hear if anyone is being uncooperative. I myself have found myself the victim of her attacks with particular frequency, due to my position."

traits.locale_text: « Elle extorque des pots-de-vin et des offrandes. Des cadeaux. Des faveurs. Pour elle-même, en particulier. Elle exploite les rumeurs d'un lien entre, hum... sa personne et Votre Seigneurie, pour mieux soutirer des dessous-de-table au tout-venant, laissant entendre que vous seriez terriblement {mf|fâché|fâchée} d'apprendre que quelqu'un a refusé de coopérer. J'ai moi-même été victime de ses attaques à de multiples reprises, de par ma position. »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Sie erpresst Schmiergelder und Opfergaben. Geschenke. Gefallen. Insbesondere für sich selbst. Sie nutzt Gerüchte über eine Verbindung zwischen sich und Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} aus, um skrupellos Schmiergelder von diversen Leuten abzukassieren. Und sie setzt die Leute dann unter Druck zu kooperieren, da Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} sonst erbost sein könnte. Aufgrund meiner Position bin ich selbst besonders häufig Opfer ihrer Angriffe geworden."
languages.original_text: "She is extorting bribes and oblations. Gifts. Favours. For herself, in particular. She is exploiting rumours of a connection between, ahem, herself and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to unscrupulously gather bribes from all and sundry, hinting at how displeased Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will be to hear if anyone is being uncooperative. I myself have found myself the victim of her attacks with particular frequency, due to my position."

traits.locale_text: "Sie erpresst Schmiergelder und Opfergaben. Geschenke. Gefallen. Insbesondere für sich selbst. Sie nutzt Gerüchte über eine Verbindung zwischen Euch und Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} aus, um skrupellos Schmiergelder von diversen Leuten abzukassieren. Und sie setzt die Leute dann unter Druck zu kooperieren, da Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} sonst erbost sein könnte. Aufgrund meiner Position bin ich selbst besonders häufig Opfer ihrer Angriffe geworden."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Rüşvet ve bağış topluyor. Armağanlar. Lütuflar. Özellikle de kendi için. Kendisi ve... {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri arasındaki bağlantıya dair söylentileri çıkarına kullanarak ahlaksızca herkesten rüşvet ve muhtelif ödemeler alıyor, iş birliği yapmak istemeyen olduğunu duyarsa {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin ne kadar hoşnutsuz kalacağından bahsediyor. Bizzat ben de pozisyonum dolayısıyla bu saldırılarının sıklıkla kurbanı olmuş bulundum."
languages.original_text: "She is extorting bribes and oblations. Gifts. Favours. For herself, in particular. She is exploiting rumours of a connection between, ahem, herself and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to unscrupulously gather bribes from all and sundry, hinting at how displeased Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will be to hear if anyone is being uncooperative. I myself have found myself the victim of her attacks with particular frequency, due to my position."

traits.locale_text: "Rüşvet ve bağış topluyor. Armağanlar. Lütuflar. Özellikle de kendi için. Kendisi ve, öhöm, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri arasındaki bağlantıya dair söylentileri çıkarına kullanarak ahlaksızca herkesten rüşvet ve muhtelif ödemeler alıyor ve iş birliği yapmak istemeyen olduğunu duyarsa {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin ne kadar hoşnutsuz kalacağından bahsediyor. Bizzat ben de pozisyonum dolayısıyla kendisinin bu saldırılarının sıklıkla kurbanı olmuş bulundum."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum
